event.title: 1673, the French settlers, along with the allied Natives, built

data.event: In 1673, the French settlers, along with the allied Natives, built a storehouse in modern-day Johnstown.

event.title: was situated on the shores of Old Breeches River, now

data.event: It was situated on the shores of Old Breeches River, now called Johnstown Creek.
It was built in 1760 in preparation for a British attack, as an attempt to block their advance down river.
